requirements.summary: Show the name “Maniha” in the home screen content while keeping the main heading text unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On the initial/home screen, the name "Maniha" is displayed in the main content area (not only in metadata like the HTML title).
The main question heading remains exactly: "Will you be my bestie forever?".
All user-facing text remains in English (the name "Maniha" is displayed as provided).

file_operations.description: Update the home screen main content to visibly display the name "Maniha" (e.g., as a subtitle/line near the existing heading) while keeping the heading text exactly "Will you be my bestie forever?" and leaving existing Yes/No behavior and animations unchanged.
